headline: Wasp (YC W21) Is Hiring a DevRel
description:
Hi HN,

I'm Matija, founder of Wasp-lang (https://github.com/wasp-lang/wasp). We're building a declarative language that makes it easy to build full-stack web apps while still using popular tools such as React & Node.js.

We're currently a team of five, with two founders - twin brothers and ex-Google/Palantir engineers. After graduating from YC we raised our first round ($1.6M) from several US & EU deep tech funds and early engineers from Facebook, Twitter, and Airbnb.

Wasp is currently in Alpha - over 350 projects have been created and the first apps have been deployed to production. We have a plan to move to Beta in the next 6 months.

We are looking for a versatile DevRel candidate who likes to code but also enjoys communicating with developers. You would be a first DevRel hire which means you'll have a lot of flexibility to shape the job to your liking.

We're a remote team based across the US (east coast), Croatia, and the Netherlands.

For more details about the role, take a look here: https://wasp-lang.notion.site/DevRel-at-Wasp-dd53d9b3a8b5496...

If this sounds interesting, please reach out matija [at] wasp-lang [dot] com.
headline_zh-Hans: 黄蜂（YC W21）正在招聘一名开发人员
headline_zh-Hant: 黃蜂（YC W21）正在招聘一名開發人員
description_zh-Hans:
Hi HN,

我是Matija，Wasp-lang的创始人（https://github.com/wasp-lang/wasp）。我们正在构建一种声明式语言，使其能够轻松构建全栈式 Web 应用程序，同时仍然使用 React & Node.js 等流行工具。

我们目前是一个五人团队，有两位创始人--双胞胎兄弟和前 Google/Palantir 的工程师。从YC毕业后，我们从几个美国和amp;欧盟的深度技术基金和来自Facebook、Twitter和Airbnb的早期工程师那里筹集了我们的第一轮资金（160万美元）。

Wasp目前处于Alpha阶段--已经创建了350多个项目，第一批应用程序已经部署到生产。我们计划在未来6个月内转为Beta版。

我们正在寻找一位多才多艺的DevRel候选人，他喜欢编码，但也喜欢与开发人员沟通。You would be a first DevRel hire which means you'll have a lot of flexibility to shape the job to your liking.

We're a remote team based across the US (east coast), Croatia, and the Netherlands.

For more details about the role, take a look here: https://wasp-lang.notion.site/DevRel-at-Wasp-dd53d9b3a8b5496...

If this sounds interesting, please reach out matija [at] wasp-lang [dot] com.
description_zh-Hant:
Hi HN,

我是Matija，Wasp-lang的創始人（https://github.com/wasp-lang/wasp）。我們正在構建一種聲明式語言，使其能夠輕鬆構建全棧式 Web 應用程序，同時仍然使用 React & Node.js 等流行工具。

我們目前是一個五人團隊，有兩位創始人--雙胞胎兄弟和前 Google/Palantir 的工程師。從YC畢業後，我們從幾個美國和amp;歐盟的深度技術基金和來自Facebook、Twitter和Airbnb的早期工程師那裡籌集了我們的第一輪資金（160萬美元）。

Wasp目前處於Alpha階段--已經創建了350多個項目，第一批應用程序已經部署到生產。我們計劃在未來6個月內轉為Beta版。

我們正在尋找一位多才多藝的DevRel候選人，他喜歡編碼，但也喜歡與開發人員溝通。You would be a first DevRel hire which means you'll have a lot of flexibility to shape the job to your liking.

We're a remote team based across the US (east coast), Croatia, and the Netherlands.

For more details about the role, take a look here: https://wasp-lang.notion.site/DevRel-at-Wasp-dd53d9b3a8b5496...

If this sounds interesting, please reach out matija [at] wasp-lang [dot] com.
